name: project-final-parent

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean:empty: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process');try{execSync('find . -type f -empty -not -path \"*/node_modules/*\" -not -path \"./.git/*\" -delete');execSync('find . -type d -empty -not -path \"*/node_modules/*\" -not -path \"./.git/*\" -delete')}catch(e){console.error(e.message)} console.log('Empty files and directories removed');"

description: Welcome to Stockholm Coffee Club — a fullstack app that helps you discover the city’s best specialty coffee spots. Whether you’re a local on the hunt for your next flat white or a visitor exploring Stockholm’s café culture, this app’s got you covered.
